name: NINJAS PVP
author: CaLiLove95
notes:
Once I heard about the nerfs I thought it was only worth it to bring one of my favorite decks to KoG for the first time. My second real KoG thanks to everyone in the ninja channel for helping me learn the deck in the past month
Also windstorm was so good never dead and only lost 3 times when I started from legend 1
